title: Plural Possession
content: The [students'|students's] lockers are in the hall.
explanationEnUs: Add only an apostrophe for plural nouns ending in s.
explanationZhTw: 以 s 結尾的複數名詞只加撇號。
explanationZhCn: 以 s 结尾的复数名词只加撇号。

title: Irregular Plural Possession
explanationEnUs: Add 's for irregular plural nouns not ending in s.
explanationZhTw: 不以 s 結尾的不規則複數名詞加 's。
explanationZhCn: 不以 s 结尾的不规则复数名词加 's。

title: Singular Possession
explanationEnUs: Singular nouns ending in s can take 's or just apostrophe (James's is common).
explanationZhTw: 以 s 結尾的單數名詞可加 's 或只加撇號。
explanationZhCn: 以 s 结尾的单数名词可加 's 或只加撇号。

title: Compound Noun Possession
explanationEnUs: Add 's to the end of the compound noun.

title: Joint Possession
content: This is [Tom and Jerry's|Tom's and Jerry's] room.
explanationEnUs: Add 's to the second name for shared possession.
explanationZhTw: 共同所有時，在第二個名字後加 's。
explanationZhCn: 共同所有时，在第二个名字后加 's。

title: Separate Possession
content: [Tom's and Jerry's|Tom and Jerry's] beds are different.
explanationEnUs: Add 's to both names for separate possession.
explanationZhTw: 分別所有時，兩個名字後都加 's。
explanationZhCn: 分别所有时，两个名字后都加 's。

title: Time Expressions
explanationEnUs: Use s' for plural time expressions.

title: Possessive Pronouns
content: A friend of [mine|me] calls it amazing.
explanationZhTw: 在 'of' 片語中使用所有格代名詞。
explanationZhCn: 在 'of' 片语中使用名词性物主代词。

title: Irregular Plural Possession
content: Men's clothing is on the second floor.
